committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to add Tampa Bay, Florida, to the national estuary program.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to give priority consideration to the inclusion of Tampa Bay, Florida, in the National Estuary Program.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to add Tampa Bay, Florida, to the national estuary program.
